short_description.en: Work with an Efficiency Excellence Network contractor to install your air-to-water heat pump and get up to $6,000 back.
short_description.es: Trabaje con un contratista de la red Efficiency Excellence Network para instalar su bomba de calor de aire a agua y reciba una devolución de hasta $6,000.

contractor_restrictions: Must be installed by an Efficiency Excellence Network contractor in the air-to-water heat pump group.
other_restrictions:
- Must be new, installed in Vermont, and listed on the Qualifying Products List at the time of purchase. Used, rebuilt, or refurbished equipment is not eligible.
- Building must have a water-based distribution system, ideally radiant heating (generally connected to a boiler).
stacking_details:
Can be stacked with the utility provider rebate offers.
VT3: BED - $12,000 ($2000/ton)
VT5: WEC - $500
VT2, VT4 - if income eligible

short_description.en: $500 bonus rebate for income-eligible Vermonters to work with an Efficiency Excellence Network contractor to install an air-to-water heat pump.
short_description.es: Los residentes de Vermont que cumplan con el nivel de ingresos pueden obtener un reembolso adicional de $500 si trabajan con un contratista de la red Efficiency Excellence Network para instalar su bomba de calor de aire a agua.

contractor_restrictions: Must be installed by an Efficiency Excellence Network contractor in the air-to-water heat pump group.
other_restrictions:
- Must be new, installed in Vermont, and listed on the Qualifying Products List at the time of purchase. Used, rebuilt, or refurbished equipment is not eligible.
- Building must have a water-based distribution system, ideally radiant heating (generally connected to a boiler).
stacking_details:
Can be stacked with the EVT rebate (VT1) and utility rebate programs depending on the account holder's utility provider (VT3, VT5).
VT2, VT4 - if income eligible

short_description.en: BED customers may receive a post purchase rebate up to $12,000 when you install an air-to-water heat pump.
short_description.es: Los clientes de BED pueden recibir un reembolso posterior a la compra de hasta $12,000 al instalar una bomba de calor de aire a agua.

contractor_restrictions: -Contractors are required to secure permits from Burlington’s Permitting and Inspections Dept.
other_restrictions:
- Heat pump must be installed after 1/1/2021.
-This rebate form must be submitted within 60 days of installation.
-Total rebate amount (including contractor rebate, this online rebate, and low-income bonus rebate) is limited to 75% of installed cost.
-Limit 1 rebate per household or business.
-Equipment must be purchased through local participating qualified professionals and HVAC Distributors only.
-Customer-sourced equipment is not eligible.
-Equipment must be on Qualified Product List.
stacking_details:
VT1
VT2, VT4 - if income eligible
financing_details:
Several local credit unions are now offering exceptionally low rates on financing for panel upgrades in addition to their special rates on heat pumps and electric vehicles.
GMCU - BED Renewable Energy Loan
Opportunities Credit Union- Home Improvement Loan (EV)
Opportunities Credit Union-  Home Energy Loan (HP)
Vermont Federal Credit Union - Energy Efficiency Home Improvement Loan
VSECU - Home Energy Loan Program

If you are financing through VSECU, VFCU, or GMCU: a scan or photo quotes from your contractor may be needed.

short_description.en: Income-eligible BED customers are eligible for an enhanced rebate of $400 when installing a qualified air-to-water heat pump.
short_description.es: Los clientes de BED que reúnan los requisitos de ingresos pueden optar a un reembolso adicional ampliado de $400 al instalar una bomba de calor aire a agua certificada.

contractor_restrictions: -Contractors are required to secure permits from Burlington’s Permitting and Inspections Dept.
other_restrictions:
- Heat pump must be installed after 1/1/2021.
-This rebate form must be submitted within 60 days of installation.
-Total rebate amount (including contractor rebate, this online rebate, and low-income bonus rebate) is limited to 75% of installed cost.
-Limit 1 rebate per household or business.
-Equipment must be purchased through local participating qualified professionals and HVAC Distributors only.
-Customer-sourced equipment is not eligible.
-Equipment must be on Qualified Product List.
stacking_details: Can be stacked with the EVT rebate program (VT1, VT2 if income elgible) and BED's regular rebate program (VT3)
financing_details:
Several local credit unions are now offering exceptionally low rates on financing for panel upgrades in addition to their special rates on heat pumps and electric vehicles.
GMCU - BED Renewable Energy Loan
Opportunities Credit Union- Home Improvement Loan (EV)
Opportunities Credit Union-  Home Energy Loan (HP)
Vermont Federal Credit Union - Energy Efficiency Home Improvement Loan
VSECU - Home Energy Loan Program

If you are financing through VSECU, VFCU, or GMCU: a scan or photo quotes from your contractor may be needed.

short_description.en: WEC members receive a flat $500 bonus rebate for an air-to-water heat pump.
short_description.es: Los miembros de Washington Electric Co-op reciben un reembolso fijo de $500 por una bomba de calor aire a agua.

stacking_details: Can be stacked with EVT point of purchase discount  (VT1, VT2 if income elgible)

short_description.en: Receive up to $400 cash back on qualifying ENERGY STAR® heat pump clothes dryers.
short_description.es: Reciba hasta $400 de devolución en efectivo en secadoras de ropa con bomba de calor ENERGY STAR® que cumplan los requisitos.

equipment_standards_restrictions:
Listed on Qualifying Products list at the time of purchase. 

$400 rebate - ENERGY STAR "Most Efficient" dryers with heat pump technology

$200 rebate - ENERGY STAR "Most Efficient" dryers with hybrid heat pump
other_restrictions:
- Must be new, installed in Vermont. 
- Used, rebuilt, or refurbished equipment is not eligible.

short_description.en: Work with a contractor to install your ducted heat pump and get a $1,000-$2,000 instant discount.
short_description.es: Trabaje con un contratista para instalar su bomba de calor con ductos y obtenga un descuento instantáneo de entre $1,000 y $2,000.

contractor_restrictions: - Installation can be complex and should be performed by a licensed contractor who is familiar with HVAC controls.
other_restrictions:
- Must be new, installed in Vermont, and listed on the Qualifying Products List at the time of purchase. Used, rebuilt, or refurbished equipment is not eligible.
- Eligible systems are based on a combination of outdoor unit model number and indoor unit model number or ducting configuration. (Note: Eligibility for centrally ducted systems that utilize the furnace air handler is based on outdoor unit model number only.)
- Generally, fossil fuel heating system must be maintained as a backup heat source.
- Existing furnace may need to be upgraded to be compatible with heat pump.

short_description.en: Vermonters with low or moderate household income may qualify for a $200 bonus rebate on a ducted heat pump, depending on their utility.
short_description.es: Los residentes de Vermont cuyos ingresos familiares sean iguales o inferiores al nivel de ingresos siguiente (rango moderado) ftienen derecho a un reembolso adicional de $200 por una bomba de calor con ductos, dependiendo de la compañía de suministro de luz que utilicen.

contractor_restrictions: - Installation can be complex and should be performed by a licensed contractor who is familiar with HVAC controls.
other_restrictions:
- Must be new, installed in Vermont, and listed on the Qualifying Products List at the time of purchase. Used, rebuilt, or refurbished equipment is not eligible.
- Eligible systems are based on a combination of outdoor unit model number and indoor unit model number or ducting configuration. (Note: Eligibility for centrally ducted systems that utilize the furnace air handler is based on outdoor unit model number only.)
- Generally, fossil fuel heating system must be maintained as a backup heat source.
- Existing furnace may need to be upgraded to be compatible with heat pump.
stacking_details: Can be stacked with the EVT rebate offers (VT7)

short_description.en: Income-eligible GMP customers qualify for a $2,200 bonus rebate on a heat pump.
short_description.es: Los clientes de GMP que cumplen con el nivel de ingresos tienen derecho a un reembolso de $2,200 para una bomba de calor.

other_restrictions:
- Must be new, installed in Vermont, and listed on the Qualifying Products List at the time of purchase. Used, rebuilt, or refurbished equipment is not eligible.
- Eligible systems are based on a combination of outdoor unit model number and indoor unit model number or ducting configuration. (Note: Eligibility for centrally ducted systems that utilize the furnace air handler is based on outdoor unit model number only.)
stacking_details: Can be stacked with the EVT rebate offers

short_description.en: Income-eligible Vermonters can receive $1,000 rebate on a ducted heat pump.
short_description.es: Los residentes de Vermont que cumplan con el nivel de ingresos pueden recibir un reembolso de $1,000 en una bomba de calor con ductos.

other_restrictions:
- Must be new, installed in Vermont, and listed on the Qualifying Products List at the time of purchase. Used, rebuilt, or refurbished equipment is not eligible.
- Eligible systems are based on a combination of outdoor unit model number and indoor unit model number or ducting configuration. (Note: Eligibility for centrally ducted systems that utilize the furnace air handler is based on outdoor unit model number only.)
- Generally, fossil fuel heating system must be maintained as a backup heat source.
- Existing furnace may need to be upgraded to be compatible with heat pump.
stacking_details: Can be stacked with the EVT rebate offers (VT7)

short_description.en: Up to $5,450 on heat pump installation.
short_description.es: Hasta $5,450 en instalación de bomba de calor.

equipment_standards_restrictions:
- Equipment must be on Qualified Product List (QPL).

- **High-Performance models must be shown on the QPL and have an HSPF2 rating of 8.1. or greater. To find “high performance” eligible models, click on the QPL and check the ENERGY STAR V6.1 Cold Climate box.
- AFTER June 1, 2023 (to align with ENERGY STAR 6.1 Cold Climate eligibility changes)
- *Cross-over temperature of 15°F maximum. Contractor must note cross-over temperature on quote or final invoice.
contractor_restrictions:
- Equipment must be purchased through local participating qualified professionals and HVAC Distributors only. Customer sourced equipment is not eligible.
- Contractors are required to secure permits from Burlington’s Permitting and Inspections Dept.
other_restrictions:
- BED’s online rebate only applies to full central distribution systems (duct work that leads to all heated spaces in the home). Short ducted heat pump systems are not considered full central distribution systems. Ductless rebates (e.g. mini-splits) will apply to short ducted installs.
- This rebate form must be submitted within 60 days of installation.
- Total rebate amount (including HVAC contractor rebate, electric contractor cost, this online rebate, and low-income bonus rebate) is limited to 75% of installed cost.
- Limit 1 rebate per household or business (includes ductless and centrally ducted systems).
stacking_details: Can be stacked with the EVT point of purchase rebate discount (VT7)

short_description.en: Income-eligible BED customers can receive a $400 enhanced rebate for a qualifying ducted heat pump.
short_description.es: Los residentes de Vermont que cumplan con el nivel de ingresos y sean clientes de BED pueden optar por un reembolso adicional ampliado de $400 al instalar una bomba de calor con ductos certificada.

equipment_standards_restrictions:
- Equipment must be on Qualified Product List (QPL).

- **High-Performance models must be shown on the QPL and have an HSPF2 rating of 8.1. or greater. To find “high performance” eligible models, click on the QPL and check the ENERGY STAR V6.1 Cold Climate box.
- AFTER June 1, 2023 (to align with ENERGY STAR 6.1 Cold Climate eligibility changes)
- *Cross-over temperature of 15°F maximum. Contractor must note cross-over temperature on quote or final invoice.
contractor_restrictions:
- Equipment must be purchased through local participating qualified professionals and HVAC Distributors only. Customer sourced equipment is not eligible.
- Contractors are required to secure permits from Burlington’s Permitting and Inspections Dept.
other_restrictions:
- BED’s online rebate only applies to full central distribution systems (duct work that leads to all heated spaces in the home). Short ducted heat pump systems are not considered full central distribution systems. Ductless rebates (e.g. mini-splits) will apply to short ducted installs.
- This rebate form must be submitted within 60 days of installation.
- Total rebate amount (including HVAC contractor rebate, electric contractor cost, this online rebate, and low-income bonus rebate) is limited to 75% of installed cost.
- Limit 1 rebate per household or business (includes ductless and centrally ducted systems).
stacking_details: Can be stacked with the EVT rebate (VT7) and BED rebate (VT12)

short_description.en: Receive a one-time $150 bill credit per unit installed for a qualifying ducted heat pump.
short_description.es: Reciba en su cuenta un crédito único de $150 por unidad instalada para una bomba de calor con ductos que cumpla los requisitos.

contractor_restrictions: - For units that were not installed through a participating contractor, VEC will provide a $250 bill credit
other_restrictions: The incentives differ depending upon when the heat pump was purchased or installed. The dates and credits (per qualifying outdoor unit) are as follows: in website here
stacking_details: Can be stacked with EVT rebate (VT7)

short_description.en: WEC members receive a flat $100 bonus rebate for a ducted heat pump.
short_description.es: Los miembros de la cooperativa WEC reciben un reembolso fijo de $100 por una bomba de calor con ductos.

stacking_details: Can be stacked with EVT rebate (VT7)

short_description.en: Hire a contractor and get a $350-$450 instant discount on qualifying models of ductless heat pumps at a participating distributor.
short_description.es: Contrate a un técnico y obtenga un descuento instantáneo de entre $350 y $450 en modelos aprobados de bombas de calor sin ductos de un distribuidor participante.

equipment_standards_restrictions: *High-Performance models must be shown on the QPL and have an HSPF rating of 11.0 or greater.
contractor_restrictions: Find a contractor
other_restrictions:
-Must be new, installed in Vermont, and listed on the Qualifying Products List at the time of purchase. Used, rebuilt, or refurbished equipment is not eligible.
-Discount is per system (including an outdoor unit and one or more indoor units).
-Offer available through participating HVAC distributors.

short_description.en: Income-eligible Vermonters qualify for a $200-$1,000 bonus rebate on a ductless heat pump, depending on their utility.
short_description.es: Los residentes de Vermont que cumplan el nivel de ingresos pueden optar a un reembolso adicional de entre $200 y $1,000 por una bomba de calor sin ductos, dependiendo de la compañía de suministro de luz que utilicen.

equipment_standards_restrictions: - listed on the Qualifying Products List at the time of purchase.
contractor_restrictions: Find a contractor
other_restrictions:
-Must be new, installed in Vermont, and listed on the Qualifying Products List at the time of purchase. Used, rebuilt, or refurbished equipment is not eligible.
-Discount is per system (including an outdoor unit and one or more indoor units).
-Offer available through participating HVAC distributors.
stacking_details: Can be stacked with EVT point of purchase discount (VT18)

short_description.en: WEC members receive a flat $100 bonus rebate for a ductless heat pump.
short_description.es: Los miembros de la cooperativa WEC reciben un reembolso único de $100 por una bomba de calor sin ductos.

stacking_details: Can be stacked with EVT point of purchase discount (VT18)

short_description.en: Customers may receive a rebate up to $2,500 on qualifying ductless heat pumps, or $500 for a second heat pump. Total rebate capped at 75% of the cost. Available through your contractor.
short_description.es: Los clientes de BED pueden recibir un reembolso de hasta $2,500 en las bombas de calor que cumplan los requisitos, o $500 por una segunda bomba de calor. El reembolso total está limitado al 75% del costo. Disponible a través de su contratista.

equipment_standards_restrictions: - Installed model must appear on the Qualified Products List.
contractor_restrictions:
- Contractors are required to secure the necessary permits from Burlington’s Permitting and Inspections Department.
- Equipment must be purchased through local participating qualified professionals and HVAC Distributors only. Customer sourced equipment is not eligible.
other_restrictions:
- Total rebate amount (including contractor rebate, this online rebate, and low-income bonus rebate) is limited to 75% of installed cost.
- This rebate form must be submitted within 60 days of installation.
- Limit 1 rebate per household or business (includes ductless and centrally ducted systems).
stacking_details:
Can be stacked with the EVT point of purchase discount (VT18) and income eligible bonus with Total rebate amount (including contractor rebate, this online rebate, and low-income bonus rebate) limited to 75% of installed cost.

- Pre-approved weatherication may be eligible for a 50% (owner-occupied) or 75% (rental) rebate.

short_description.en: Income-eligible customers qualify for a $400 enhanced rebate for a ductless heat pump.
short_description.es: Los clientes de BED que cumplan los niveles de ingresos pueden optar a un reembolso mejorado de $400 por una bomba de calor sin ductos.

equipment_standards_restrictions: - Installed model must appear on the Qualified Products List.
contractor_restrictions:
- Contractors are required to secure the necessary permits from Burlington’s Permitting and Inspections Department.
- Equipment must be purchased through local participating qualified professionals and HVAC Distributors only. Customer sourced equipment is not eligible.
other_restrictions:
- Enhanced rebate bonus is applicable on first system only, and is not available on second heat pump systems.
- Total rebate amount (including contractor rebate, this online rebate, and low-income bonus rebate) is limited to 75% of installed cost.
- This rebate form must be submitted within 60 days of installation.
- Limit 1 rebate per household or business (includes ductless and centrally ducted systems).
stacking_details:
Can be stacked with the EVT point of purchase discount (VT18) and BED incentive (for first system) (VT23) with Total rebate amount (including contractor rebate, this online rebate, and low-income bonus rebate) limited to 75% of installed cost.

- Pre-approved weatherication may be eligible for a 50% (owner-occupied) or 75% (rental) rebate.

short_description.en: Receive a one-time $150 bill credit per unit installed for a qualifying ductless heat pump.
short_description.es: Reciba un crédito único en su cuenta de $150 por unidad instalada para una bomba de calor sin ductos certificada.

other_restrictions:
- For units that were not installed through a participating contractor, VEC will provide a $250 bill credit
- The incentives differ depending upon when the heat pump was purchased or installed. The dates and credits (per qualifying outdoor unit) are as follows: in website here

short_description.en: 25% of the upfront cost of a used high-efficiency vehicle, up to $5,000, for low and moderate income car buyers.
short_description.es: El Estado de Vermont ha colaborado con Capstone para ofrecer el programa MileageSmart. Éste ofrece a los compradores de automóviles con ingresos bajos y moderados un incentivo que cubre el 25% del costo inicial de un vehículo usado de alta eficiencia, hasta un máximo de $5,000l.

equipment_standards_restrictions:
Vehicles must have an efficiency of 40 miles per gallon or higher. This includes many hybrid, plug-in hybrid and all-electric vehicles.
the car needs to be pre-owned, rated at least 40 combined MPG or MPGe, and located at a Vermont Dealership. (list of eligible vehicles)
stacking_details: Can be stacked with replace your ride program for used PEV (VT30)

short_description.en: Up to $900 back on qualifying level 2 charger purchased within 60 days of vehicle purchase or lease. May be eligible for discounted EV charging rate.
short_description.es: Devolución de hasta $900 por la compra de un cargador de nivel 2 válido en los 60 días siguientes a la compra o arrendamiento del vehículo. Con un cargador autorizado, puede registrarse para obtener una tarifa de carga de VE con descuento de 8 centavos/kWH cuando realice la recarga entre las 10 de la noche y el mediodía.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Charger must be a qualifying EV charger. Visit our EV Rate page for a list of products.
contractor_restrictions: Contractors are required to secure the necessary permits from Burlington’s Permitting and Inspections Department.
other_restrictions:
- Charger must be purchased within 60 days of purchase of the vehicle. If your preferred charger is out of stock and you Contact Energy Services within the 60-day period, BED will extend the purchase period to 180 days
- Charger must be a qualifying EV charger. Visit our EV Rate page for a list of products
-Rebate will be processed upon installation and enrollment in Residential EV rate.
-Total rebate amount (including contractor rebate, this online rebate, and low-income bonus rebate) is limited to 75% of installed cost.
stacking_details: Enrollment in Residential EV rate program

short_description.en: VEC offers level II EV chargers to members at no charge or offers a $250 incentive if you purchases your own level II charger.
short_description.es: VEC ofrece cargadores de VE de nivel II a sus miembros sin costo alguno o les ofrece un incentivo de $250 si compra su propio cargador de nivel II.

contractor_restrictions: Participants are responsible for the installation and must install the charger and enroll it in VEC's communications platform within 90 days of receiving the charger.
other_restrictions:
- Only for residential members in VEC service territory, with an electric vehicle (EV).
- The residence where the unit is installed must be owner-occupied with a VEC account in the homeowner’s name, or if a rental, the account
owner must obtain the written consent of the homeowner to install
- When VEC expects peak demand, we will send a signal to the charger and request that it not charge during that time period, typically 2-4 hours. 

- If you purchase your own level II charger, you can receive a $250 incentive if you either 1) set a schedule to not charger from 5-9pm Monday through Friday, or 2) if it is a Flo or ChargePoint, enroll it in VEC's communications platform to receive another $50 upfront incentive and $8/month as long as you do not opt out of events

short_description.en: $250 bill credit for qualifying level 2 home charging equipment when avoiding charging between 5:00-9:00pm.
short_description.es: Un crédito en la cuenta de $250 para equipos de recarga doméstica de nivel 2 autorizados cuando se evite realizar la recarga entre las 5:00 y las 9:00 p.m.

other_restrictions: - set a schedule to not charger from 5-9pm Monday through Friday, or if it is a Flo or ChargePoint, enroll it in VEC's communications platform to receive another $50 upfront incentive and $8/month as long as you do not opt out of events.

short_description.en: Free level 2 charger with electric vehicle purchase (not including installation). Charger must be part of GMP peak demand reduction program.
short_description.es: Equipo de recarga de nivel 2 gratuito con la compra de un vehículo eléctrico (sin incluir la instalación). El cargador debe estar conectado al Internet y ser parte del programa de GMP para reducir la demanda durante las horas pico. Los equipos compatibles pueden recibir descuentos para realizar la recarga fuera de las horas pico.

short_description.en: Receive Level 2 charger and $500 rebate once charger is connected to Wi-Fi with a schedule set. Members pay cost of installation and service upgrades.
short_description.es: Los miembros que participan en PowerShift reciben un equipo de recarga de nivel 2 y un reembolso de $500 de Efficiency Vermont una vez que su cargador ha sido instalado y conectado a Wi-Fi con un horario establecido. Los miembros sólo son responsables del costo de instalación y de los costos de modernización que se requieran para la entrada de servicio y el transformador.

short_description.en: Receive Level 2 charger and $500 rebate once charger is connected to Wi-Fi with a schedule set. Members pay cost of installation and service upgrades.
short_description.es: Los miembros que participan en PowerShift reciben un equipo de recarga de nivel 2 y un reembolso de $500 de Efficiency Vermont una vez que su cargador ha sido instalado y conectado a Wi-Fi con un horario establecido. Los miembros sólo son responsables del costo de instalación y de los costos de modernización que se requieran para la entrada de servicio y el transformador.

short_description.en: Hire a participating contractor and get up to $2,100 cash back per ton on qualifying equipment for a ground source heat pump.
short_description.es: Contrate a un contratista participante y obtenga hasta $2,100 de reembolso por tonelada en equipos que cumplan con los requisitos para una bomba de calor de fuente terrestre.

equipment_standards_restrictions:
ENERGY STAR® certified (water-to-air and water-to-water heat pumps) or have AHRI certified performance that meets or exceeds the values below under full load conditions.                 

Water to Water - 16.1EER 3.1COP
Water to Air - 17.1EER 3.6COP
equipment_capacity_restrictions: New residential systems (not replacing an existing geothermal system) up to 10 tons and commercial systems up to 50 tons.
contractor_restrictions: Must be installed by an Efficiency Excellence Network contractor in the ground source heat pump group.
other_restrictions:
-Must be new (not replacing an existing geothermal system), installed in Vermont, and listed on the Qualifying Products List (or meet qualifying criteria below) at the time of purchase. Used, rebuilt, or refurbished equipment is not eligible.
-If you receive electric service from Hyde Park Electric, you may not be eligible for the full incentive amount

short_description.en: Income-eligible Vermonters qualify for a $500 bonus rebate on eligible ground source heat pump.
short_description.es: Los residentes de Vermont que cumplan el nivel de ingresos podrán beneficiarse de un reembolso adicional de $500 en la compra de una bomba de calor Ground Source autorizada.

equipment_standards_restrictions:
ENERGY STAR® certified (water-to-air and water-to-water heat pumps) or have AHRI certified performance that meets or exceeds the values below under full load conditions.                 

Water to Water - 16.1EER 3.1COP
Water to Air - 17.1EER 3.6COP
equipment_capacity_restrictions: New residential systems (not replacing an existing geothermal system) up to 10 tons and commercial systems up to 50 tons.
contractor_restrictions: Must be installed by an Efficiency Excellence Network contractor in the ground source heat pump group.
other_restrictions:
-Must be new (not replacing an existing geothermal system), installed in Vermont, and listed on the Qualifying Products List (or meet qualifying criteria below) at the time of purchase. Used, rebuilt, or refurbished equipment is not eligible.
-If you receive electric service from Hyde Park Electric, you may not be eligible for the full incentive amount
stacking_details: Can be stacked with EVT rebate (VT37)

short_description.en: WEC members may receive a bonus rebate of up to $2,000 on a ground-source heat pump, based on capacity.
short_description.es: Los miembros de la cooperativa WEC pueden recibir un reembolso adicional de hasta $2,000 según la capacidad de la bomba de calor GS.

stacking_details: Can be stacked with EVT point of purchase discount (VT37)

short_description.en: BED customers may receive a rebate up to $2,500 on qualifying ground source heat pumps, plus an additional $500 for a second ground source heat pump.
short_description.es: Los clientes de BED pueden recibir un reembolso de hasta $2,500 en las bombas de calor GS que cumplan los requisitos, más $500 adicionales por una segunda bomba de calor GS.

contractor_restrictions: - Only qualified drillers, designers, and installers approved by BED are eligible to submit applications. If you are a ground-source heat pump system driller, designer, or installer, become a BED-approved contractor to work with customers applying for this rebate
other_restrictions:
- This rebate is for customers working with BED-approved designers and installers of ground-source heat pump systems
- Designers and installers working with customers on ground-source heat pump systems of any size must complete a preliminary technical analysis before applying. To receive rebates, the qualified designer must complete the design, and involve BED in design review. To receive rebates, qualified contractors must complete the drilling, loop field installations, and the final installation. Rebates are provided upon completion of installation, after a BED field inspection.
- Your project must be located in Burlington, Vermont. You must design and install your project according to the requirements of the Vermont Commercial Building Energy Code.

short_description.en: $600 rebate for a heat pump water heater, or $600 instant discount through participating distributors.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $600 por un calentador de agua con bomba de calor, o un descuento instantáneo de $600 mediante distribuidores participantes.

equipment_standards_restrictions:
$300 for NEEA Tier 1-2

$600 for NEEA Tier 3-4
other_restrictions:
-Must be new, installed in Vermont, and listed on the Qualifying Products List at the time of purchase. Used, rebuilt, or refurbished equipment is not eligible.
-Post-purchase rebate is not valid if instant rebate has already been received on the purchase of a qualifying unit through a participating distributor.
stacking_details: Instant rebate for contractor install and post purchase rebate for DIY
financing_details: Home Energy Loan - Flexible financing for homeowners starting at 0% interest.

short_description.en: 90% off a heat pump water heater, up to $4,500, for moderate-income customers.
short_description.es: Un 90% de descuento en un calentador de agua con bomba de calor, hasta $4,500, para clientes con ingresos moderados.

other_restrictions:
-Must be new, installed in Vermont, and listed on the Qualifying Products List at the time of purchase. Used, rebuilt, or refurbished equipment is not eligible.
-Post-purchase rebate is not valid if instant rebate has already been received on the purchase of a qualifying unit through a participating distributor.
stacking_details: Excludes VT-41
financing_details: Home Energy Loan- Flexible financing for homeowners starting at 0% interest.

short_description.en: $600 available from BED through Efficiency VT, available through your contractor.
short_description.es: Los clientes de BED pueden recibir un reembolso de hasta $600 por un calentador de agua con bomba de calor, disponible a través de su contratista.

contractor_restrictions:
-Installations must be done by professional contractors only.
-Contractors are required to secure the necessary permits from Burlington’s Permitting and Inspections Department.
other_restrictions:
-Unit must be listed on the Efficiency Vermont qualified products list at the time of purchase.
-Heat pump must be installed after 1/1/2022.
-Rebate form must be submitted within 60 days of installation.
stacking_details:
Can be stacked with EVT point of purchase discount. (VT41)

Total rebate amount (including contractor rebate, this online rebate, and low-income bonus rebate) is limited to 75% of installed cost.

short_description.en: Income-eligible customers recieve an enhanced bonus rebate of $200 for a heat pump water heater.
short_description.es: Los clientes de BED que cumplen los niveles de ingresos recibirán un reembolso adicional ampliado de $200 por un calentador de agua con bomba de calor.

contractor_restrictions:
-Installations must be done by professional contractors only.
-Contractors are required to secure the necessary permits from Burlington’s Permitting and Inspections Department.
other_restrictions:
-Unit must be listed on the Efficiency Vermont qualified products list at the time of purchase.
-Heat pump must be installed after 1/1/2022.
-Rebate form must be submitted within 60 days of installation.
stacking_details:
Can be stacked with EVT point of purchase discount. (VT41)

Total rebate amount (including contractor rebate, this online rebate, and low-income bonus rebate) is limited to 75% of installed cost.

short_description.en: WEC members may receive $100 for replacing a fossil-fired hot water system.
short_description.es: Los miembros de la cooperativa WEC pueden recibir $100 para reemplazar su sistema de agua caliente que funciona con combustibles fósiles

other_restrictions:
- Only for replacing fossil-fired hot water system
- Not applicable when replacing conventional electric system
stacking_details: Can be stacked with EVT point of purchase discount (VT41)

short_description.en: Up to $200 back on the purchase of a new electric induction cooktop when replacing a non-electric cooktop.
short_description.es: Devolución de hasta $200 en la compra de una nueva parrilla de inducción eléctrica para reemplazar una parrilla no eléctrica.

equipment_capacity_restrictions: -Cooktop or Range must be at least 24″ in both length and width.
other_restrictions:
-Both standalone cooktops and ranges with built-in induction cooktops are eligible.
-Only valid on purchases of new induction ranges or range cooktops.
-Rebate is only available for installations in new homes and for replacement of existing natural gas or propane fueled ranges or cooktops.
-Induction cooktop must include no less than three elements.
-Cooktop or Range must be at least 24″ in both length and width.
-This rebate form must be submitted within 60 days of installation.
-Limit one rebate per account.

short_description.en: $200 back when replacing a fossil fuel cooktop/range with an induction cooktop or range.
short_description.es: Una devolución de $200 al sustituir una parrilla/estufa que funciona con combustible fósil por una parrilla/estufa de inducción.

other_restrictions:
-For installed (not portable) cooktops/ranges
-Must be replacing fossil fuel cooktop/range
-One rebate per GMP account
-Application for rebate must be submitted within the same calendar year as the purchase, or no more than 180 days from the purchase date if submitted in the following calendar year.

short_description.en: $100 bill credit for installing an induction cooktop or range.
short_description.es: Un crédito de $100 en su cuenta por instalar una parrilla o una estufa de inducción.

short_description.en: Get cash back on materials for three elgibile DIY projects including weather-stripping, insulation, and air sealing. If you are a VGS customer, visit www.vermontgas.com to determine eligibility for further weatherization projects
short_description.es: Reciba dinero en efectivo en materiales para tres proyectos de auto-instalación elegibiles, incluyendo la colocación de sellos, aislamiento y sellado para juntas herméticas.

other_restrictions:
-Valid for purchases made (and projects completed) within the previous calendar year.
-Limit one rebate per Vermont residential electric account per calendar year.

Eligible Projects (complete 3):
-Build or buy an air-tight, well-insulated attic hatch
-Spot air-seal and insulate your attic
-Build an air-tight, well-insulated bulkhead door in your basement
-Air-seal and insulate the box sill and rim joists in your basement
-Air-seal leaks in your foundation wall (common problem area with stone foundations)
-Weatherize windows
-Weatherize exterior doors
-Install a new window, Low-E or WindowDressers storm window (each window can count as one project)
-Air-seal HVAC ducts
-Insulate heat/hot water pipes
stacking_details:
- Rebate cannot be combined with any other Efficiency Vermont offer (including
point of purchase discounts)

short_description.en: Work with an Efficiency Excellence Network contractor to improve your home's insulation and air sealing and get 75% off project cost up to $4,000.
short_description.es: Trabaje con un técnico especialista de la red Efficiency Excellence Network para mejorar el aislamiento y los sellos herméticos de su vivienda, garantizando el confort, la salud y la seguridad de los ocupantes, y obtenga un 75% de descuento en el costo del proyecto, hasta un máximo de $4,000.

contractor_restrictions: A participating Efficiency Excellence Network contractor must oversee the work.
other_restrictions:
- Offer is for existing single-family Vermont residences and rental properties with fewer than five units.
- Eligible projects achieve minimum air leakage reduction of 10% (as measured by a pre- and post-blower door test), and installation of all recommended health and safety improvements.

short_description.en: Work with an Efficiency Excellence Network contractor to improve your home's insulation and air sealing and get 75% off project costs up to $9,500.
short_description.es: Trabaje con un técnico especialista de la red Efficiency Excellence Network para mejorar el aislamiento y los sellos herméticos de su vivienda, garantizando el confort, la salud y la seguridad de los ocupantes, y obtenga un 75% de descuento en los costos del proyecto, hasta $9,500.

contractor_restrictions: A participating Efficiency Excellence Network contractor must oversee the work.
other_restrictions:
- Offer is for existing single-family Vermont residences and rental properties with fewer than five units.
- Eligible projects achieve minimum air leakage reduction of 10% (as measured by a pre- and post-blower door test), and installation of all recommended health and safety improvements.

short_description.en: The State's Weatherization Assistance Program offers free services including energy audits, insulation and air sealing for income-eligible households.
short_description.es: El Programa Estatal Weatherization Assistance Program (de Asistencia para la Climatización) ofrece servicios gratuitos que incluyen auditorías de consumo energético, aislamiento y sellos herméticos para hogares que cumplen con el nivel de ingresos

other_restrictions:
- eligible if you have not received free weatherization services in the past 15 years
- at least ONE of the following is true: Your household income meets the income limits, OR You are an active Seasonal Fuel Assistance household, OR Someone in your household gets Supplemental Security Income (SSI), OR An adult in your household received either Reach Up, Reach First, or the Reach Up Post-Secondary Education grant in the past 12 months.  A Child-Only Reach Up grant does not count.

short_description.en: WEC members receive 75% of project costs back, up to $2,000.
short_description.es: A los miembros de WEC se les devuelve el 75% de los costos del proyecto, hasta un máximo de $2,000.

short_description.en: Vermont residents whose annual household income falls at or below moderate income thresholds are eligible for 75% of project costs back, up to $5,000.
short_description.es: Los residentes de Vermont cuyos ingresos familiares anuales se sitúen en el umbral de ingresos moderados o por debajo del mismo, pueden optar a la devolución del 75% de los costos del proyecto, hasta un máximo de $5,000.

short_description.en: VGS offers qualifying single-family homeowners an incentive to cover 50% of comprehensive weatherization project costs up to $3,500.
short_description.es: VGS ofrece a los propietarios de viviendas unifamiliares que cumplan los requisitos un incentivo para cubrir el 50% de los costos del proyecto de climatización integral hasta un máximo de $3,500.

contractor_restrictions: All customers are eligible for incentives and special financing when hiring a Building Performance Institute (BPI) contractor

short_description.en: VGS offers qualifying single-family homeowners an incentive to cover 75% of comprehensive weatherization project costs up to $5,000.
short_description.es: VGS ofrece a los propietarios de viviendas unifamiliares que cumplan los requisitos un incentivo para cubrir el 75% de los costos del proyecto de climatización integral hasta un máximo de $5,000.

short_description.en: Up to $100 back for residential push mower or up to $300 back for a ride-on mower, $50 on electric chainsaws and trimmers, $40 on electric leaf blowers.
short_description.es: Hasta $100 de devolución por una podadora manual residencial o hasta $300 de reembolso por una podadora de operador a bordo, $50 en motosierras y desbrozadoras eléctricas, $40 en sopladores de hojas eléctricos.

equipment_standards_restrictions:
Based on lawn mower style.

Push mower:
- Push mower must be at least 36-volt
- Self-propelled push mowers are also eligible
-Rebate amount is limited to the lesser of $100 or 50% of the purchase price

Ride mower:
- Ride mower must be at least 48-volt
- Rebate amount is limited to the lesser of $300 or 50% of the purchase price
other_restrictions:
-valid on purchases of new electric lawn mowers (corded or cordless). Reconditioned mowers are not eligible
- This rebate form must be submitted within 60 days of purchase.
- Limit one rebate per account
-For a push lawn mower, the rebate amount is limited to the lesser of $100 or 50% of the purchase price
- For a Ride mower, the rebate amount is limited to the lesser of $300 or 50% of the purchase price

short_description.en: Receive up to $40 back for residential electric leaf blower (commercial up to $200).
short_description.es: Reciba hasta $40 de reembolso por un soplador eléctrico de hojas residencial (o comercial, hasta $200)

equipment_standards_restrictions:
- Leaf blower must come with at least a 40-volt battery.
- Reconditioned leaf blowers are not eligible.
other_restrictions:
- This rebate form must be submitted within 60 days of purchase.
- Limit one rebate per account
- the rebate amount is limited to the lesser of $50 or 50% of the purchase price

short_description.en: $100 rebate on electric lawn tractors and $50 on push mowers, plus $25 rebate on electric trimmers, electric leaf blowers, and electric chainsaws.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $100 en tractores cortadores de césped eléctricos y de $50 en podadoras manuales, además de un reembolso de $25 en desbrozadoras eléctricas, sopladores de hojas eléctricos y motosierras eléctricas.

equipment_standards_restrictions: - e-mower must be at least 36-volt
contractor_restrictions: Must be purchased at a retailer in Vermont.
other_restrictions:
- For a new electric equipment only
- Application for rebate must be submitted within the same calendar year as the purchase, or no more than 180 days from the purchase date if submitted in the following calendar year.

short_description.en: $25 rebate on electric trimmers, electric leaf blowers, and electric chainsaws.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $25 en desbrozadoras eléctricas, sopladores de hojas eléctricos y motosierras eléctricas.

equipment_standards_restrictions: - e-mower must be at least 36-volt
contractor_restrictions: Must be purchased at a retailer in Vermont.
other_restrictions:
- For a new electric equipment only
- Application for rebate must be submitted within the same calendar year as the purchase, or no more than 180 days from the purchase date if submitted in the following calendar year.

short_description.en: $75 for an electric ride-on lawnmower.
short_description.es: $75 para una podadora eléctrica de operador a bordo.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Electric lawn mower batter must be at least 36 volt

short_description.en: $75 for residential electric trimmers and blowers purchased in 2024.
short_description.es: $75 para la compra de desbrozadoras y sopladores eléctricos residenciales en 2024

short_description.en: $50 bill credit for new, corded or cordless residential electric lawnmowers purchased on or after May 11, 2019.
short_description.es: Un crédito de $50 en su cuenta para podadoras  eléctricas residenciales nuevas, con o sin cable, adquiridas a partir del 11 de mayo del 2019.

short_description.en: $50 rebate for an electric lawnmower or $200 for a push mower. $25 rebate on electric trimmers, electric leaf blowers, and electric chainsaws.
short_description.es: Un reembolso de $50 para una podadora eléctrica residencial o de $200 para una podadora manual. Un reembolso de $25 en recortadoras eléctricas, sopladores de hojas eléctricos y motosierras eléctricas.

equipment_standards_restrictions: Mower must be at least 36-volt.
other_restrictions:
- The rebate amount cannot exceed the purchase cost.
- Lawn mower must be charged in your electric utility's service territory
- For new electric equipment only..

short_description.en: Get up to $100 cash back on qualifying ENERGY STAR® smart thermostats if wholesale discount has not already been received on the purchase.
short_description.es: Obtenga hasta $100 de reembolso en efectivo en termostatos inteligentes ENERGY STAR® que cumplan los requisitos si no se ha recibido ya el descuento de mayorista en la compra.

other_restrictions:
- Must be new, installed in Vermont, and listed on the Qualifying Products List at the time of purchase. Used, rebuilt, or refurbished equipment is not eligible.
- Customer contribution of $50 to the pre-tax purchase price of each product is required.
- Rebate is not valid if wholesale discount has already been received on the purchase of the unit. (Rebate cannot be combined with any other Efficiency Vermont offer (including point of purchase discounts)
- After thermostat is installed and connected to wi-fi, it must be registered as a connected device with the manufacturer.
- Lifetime limit of two smart thermostat rebates per Vermont residence and six per Vermont business location.

short_description.en: Apply for a rebate and get $25-40 cash back on qualifying ENERGY STAR® models.
short_description.es: Solicite un reembolso y reciba entre $25 y $40 de devolución en efectivo en los modelos ENERGY STAR® que cumplan los requisitos.

equipment_standards_restrictions: ENERGY STAR or ENERGY STAR Most Efficient
other_restrictions:
- Must be new, installed in Vermont. 
- Used, rebuilt, or refurbished equipment is not eligible.

short_description.en: Get $6,000 back for installing a wood pellet boiler or furnace.
short_description.es: Reciba $6,000 de devolución por instalar un calentador u horno de pellets de madera.

other_restrictions: - Must be installed by an Efficiency Excellence Network - HVAC Central Wood Pellet Heating Systems contractor

short_description.en: Hire a contractor and get a $15-$600 instant rebate on each qualifying high-performance circulator pump at participating distributors.
short_description.es: Contrate a un técnico especialista y reciba un reembolso instantáneo de entre $15 y $600 por cada bomba circuladora de alto desempeño autorizada con distribuidores participantes...

other_restrictions: - Must be new, installed in Vermont, and listed on the Qualifying Products List at the time of purchase.

short_description.en: Install integrated controls with a new ductless heat pump in a single family home and get up to $600 back.
short_description.es: Instale controles integrados con una nueva bomba de calor sin ductos en una vivienda unifamiliar y reciba hasta $600 de reembolso.

other_restrictions: - Equipment must be installed by an Efficiency Excellence Network contractor enrolled in the Integrated Controls group.

short_description.en: Apply for a rebate and get up to $100 cash back on qualifying fixtures.
short_description.es: Solicite un reembolso y reciba hasta $100 de devolución en efectivo en enseres que cumplan los requisitos.

short_description.en: Apply for a rebate and get up to $400 cash back on qualifying ENERGY STAR® heat pump models.
short_description.es: Solicite un reembolso y reciba hasta $400 de devolución en los modelos de bomba de calor ENERGY STAR® que cumplan los requisitos.

short_description.en: Get $100 back for ENERGY STAR® “Most Efficient” certified models.
short_description.es: Reciba $100 de devolución por modelos con certificación ENERGY STAR® "Más eficientes". También puede optar por créditos fiscales federales que le ayuden a compensar el costo de estos proyectos.

short_description.en: Get a $400 instant discount at participating retailers for a new, high-efficiency stove.
short_description.es: Reciba un descuento instantáneo de $400 en comercios participantes por una estufa nueva de alto rendimiento.

short_description.en: Incentive up to $5,000 for a new electric vehicle, or up to $3,000 for a new plug-in hybrid vehicle.
short_description.es: Incentivo de hasta $5,000 para un vehículo eléctrico nuevo o de hasta $3,000 para un vehículo híbrido enchufable nuevo.

equipment_standards_restrictions:
State Incentives are only available on new vehicle purchase or leases of eligible plug-in electric vehicle models (all-electric or plug-in hybrid) with a base MSRP of $50,000 or less. Vehicle MSRP exemptions are available for individuals with disabilities that require special registration plates or placards as defined in 23 V.S.A §304a.
- Table 2 in ' State of Vermont Plug-in Electric Vehicle Incentive Program Guidelines' lists the eligible models for State Incentive program. (will be updated as new PEV models are introduced with a base MSRP under $50,000)
contractor_restrictions: Dealer list
other_restrictions:
- For personal use vehicles only; not available for vehicles intended for resale.
-The incentive program does not currently extend to commercial or non-profit organizations.
- The vehicle must be registered within the State of Vermont.
- Leases must be for a term of 24 months or longer.  
-There is a limit of one incentive per individual per year, as determined by a minimum 12 month elapsed time from a prior State of Vermont EV incentive approval.
stacking_details: Can be stacked with Replace your ride program for new PEV (VT29)

short_description.en: Incentive up to $2,500 for a new electric vehicle, or up to $1,500 for a new plug-in hybrid vehicle.
short_description.es: Incentivo de hasta $2,500 para un vehículo eléctrico nuevo o de hasta $1,500 para un vehículo híbrido enchufable nuevo.

contractor_restrictions: Dealer list
other_restrictions:
- For personal use vehicles only; not available for vehicles intended for resale.
-The incentive program does not currently extend to commercial or non-profit organizations.
- The vehicle must be registered within the State of Vermont.
- Leases must be for a term of 24 months or longer.  
-There is a limit of one incentive per individual per year, as determined by a minimum 12 month elapsed time from a prior State of Vermont EV incentive approval.
stacking_details: Can be stacked with Replace your ride program for new PEV (VT29)

short_description.en: Incentive up to $2,200 for a new electric vehicle, or up to $1,000 for a plug-in hybrid.
short_description.es: Incentivo de hasta $2,200 para un vehículo eléctrico nuevo o de hasta $1,000 para un vehículo híbrido enchufable nuevo.

short_description.en: Incentive up to $1,500 for a used electric vehicle, or up to $750 for a plug-in hybrid.
short_description.es: Incentivo de hasta $1,500 para un vehículo eléctrico usado o de hasta $750 para un vehículo híbrido enchufable usado.

short_description.en: An extra $1,000 for leasing or buying a new all-electric vehicle, for income-qualified customers.
short_description.es: Un suplemento de $1,000 por el arrendamiento o la compra de un vehículo nuevo totalmente eléctrico, para clientes que cumplan los requisitos de ingresos.

short_description.en: An extra $1,000 for leasing or buying a used all-electric vehicle, for income-qualified customers.
short_description.es: Un suplemento de $1,000 por el arrendamiento o la compra de un vehículo totalmente eléctrico usado, para clientes que cumplan los requisitos de ingresos.

short_description.en: Incentive up to $2,300 for a new electric vehicle, or up to $2,000 for a plug-in hybrid.
short_description.es: Incentivo de hasta $2,300 para un vehículo eléctrico nuevo o de hasta $2,000 para un vehículo híbrido enchufable nuevo.

short_description.en: Incentive up to $1,300 for a used electric vehicle or plug-in hybrid.
short_description.es: Incentivo de hasta $1,300 para un vehículo eléctrico o vehículo híbrido enchufable usado.

short_description.en: An extra $700 for a new all-electric vehicle, or $300 for a plug-in hybrid, for income-qualified customers.
short_description.es: Un suplemento de $700 por un vehículo nuevo totalmente eléctrico, o de $300 por un híbrido enchufable, para los clientes que cumplan los requisitos de ingresos.

short_description.en: An extra $300 for a used all-electric vehicle or plug-in hybrid, for income-qualified customers.
short_description.es: Un suplemento de $300 por un vehículo usado totalmente eléctrico o híbrido enchufable, para clientes que cumplan los requisitos de ingresos.

short_description.en: $500 for purchasing or leasing a new all-electric vehicle, or $250 for a plug-in hybrid.
short_description.es: $500 por la compra o el arrendamiento financiero de un vehículo nuevo totalmente eléctrico, o $250 por un híbrido enchufable.

short_description.en: $250 for purchasing or leasing a used electric vehicle.
short_description.es: $250 por la compra o el arrendamiento de un vehículo eléctrico usado.

short_description.en: An extra $700 for purchasing or leasing a new all-electric vehicle, for income-qualified customers.
short_description.es: Un suplemento de $700 por la compra o el arrendamiento de un vehículo nuevo totalmente eléctrico, para clientes que cumplan los requisitos de ingresos.

short_description.en: $500 for purchasing a new all-electric vehicle, or $250 for a plug-in hybrid.
short_description.es: $500 por la compra de un vehículo nuevo totalmente eléctrico, o $250 por un híbrido enchufable.

short_description.en: $500 for purchasing a used all-electric vehicle, or $250 for a plug-in hybrid.
short_description.es: $500 por la compra de un vehículo usado totalmente eléctrico, o $250 por un híbrido enchufable.

short_description.en: An extra $500 for purchasing a new all-electric vehicle or plug-in hybrid, for income-qualified customers.
short_description.es: Un suplemento de $500 por la compra de un nuevo vehículo totalmente eléctrico o híbrido enchufable, para clientes que cumplan los requisitos de ingresos.

stacking_details: You must qualify for one of the higher State of Vermont EV incentives

short_description.en: VGS offers qualifying single-family homeowners an incentive to cover 75% of comprehensive weatherization project costs up to $9,500.
short_description.es: VGS ofrece a los propietarios de viviendas unifamiliares que cumplan los requisitos un incentivo para cubrir el 75% de los costos del proyecto de climatización integral hasta un máximo de $9,500.

short_description.en: 100% off a heat pump water heater, up to $5,000, for low-income customers.
short_description.es: Un 100% de descuento en un calentador de agua con bomba de calor, hasta $5,000, para clientes con bajos ingresos.

stacking_details: Excludes VT-41 and VT-42

short_description.en: BED rebate offered through Efficiency Vermont. Apply for a rebate and get up to $400 cash back on qualifying ENERGY STAR® heat pump models.
short_description.es: BED reembolso ofrecido por Efficiency Vermont. Solicite un reembolso y reciba hasta $400 de devolución en los modelos de bomba de calor ENERGY STAR® que cumplan los requisitos.

short_description.en: Work with a contractor to install your ducted heat pump and get a $1,000-$2,000 instant discount.
short_description.es: Trabaje con un contratista para instalar su bomba de calor con ductos y obtenga un descuento instantáneo de entre $1,000 y $2,000.

short_description.en: Hire a contractor and get a $350-$450 instant discount on qualifying models of ductless heat pumps at a participating distributor.
short_description.es: Contrate a un técnico y obtenga un descuento instantáneo de entre $350 y $450 en modelos aprobados de bombas de calor sin ductos de un distribuidor participante.
